metrics.metric: Accumn is a data and information services provider operated by Bluevine Technologies Pvt Ltd. This Report is generated at the specific request of our client and It is meant for their sole and exclusive use only and cannot be sold, licensed or redistributed in any manner whatsoever. Information provided has been obtained from authentic and reliable sources. Though, Accumn has exercised reasonable amount of due diligence to ensure the correctness and accuracy of the information contained in this report, Accumn extends no guarantee to that effect. Accumn strongly advises its clients and users of this information to independently verify them before relying thereon for taking any business decision having financial or commercial consequences. Accumn does not take any responsibility in respect of any loss, damages, cost arising on account of action taken or not taken based on the information provided in this report.

metrics.description: DESCRIPTION
Provides a holistic performance summary of the entity and all the relevant information data sets across the report period.
Yearly and Quarterly Trends of Revenue, Purchases and Margin as per GST data across the the report period.
Abstract data sets of Revenue, Purchases and Margin for the Peak months and the Lull months
Ranking of Top 20 B2B Customers and its Analysis for each FY
Ranking of Top 20 B2B Suppliers and Analysis  for each FY
Ranking of Products and Analysis of Top 10 HSN wise & Chapter Wise Products for each FY
Highlights Revenue and Purchase executed with the same vendor month wise

Index_2_gst_data_tables_refined_data_set.section_title: 2 GST DATA TABLES (REFINED DATA SETS FROM GST RETURNS) DESCRIPTION

metrics.table_title: GST DATA TABLES (REFINED DATA SETS FROM GST RETURNS)
metrics.description: DESCRIPTION
Master Profile Details of the enity and GSTR 3B & GSTR-1 Return filling details
Extensive data of Revenue, Purchases and Margin YoY, QoQ and MoM as per GST Returns across the report period along with % changes respectively
Detailed Breakup of Revenue and Purchases & Expenses MoM basis across the report period as per GST Returns

metrics.table_title: Bifurcation of Revenue and Purchases (Before Adjustments)
metrics.description: Detailed Breakup of Revenue and Purchases & Expenses MoM basis across the report period as per GST Returns (Before Adjustments)

metrics.table_title: State Wise Bifurcation of Revenue and Purchases
metrics.description: State Wise Bifurcation of Revenue and Purchases & Expenses MoM basis across the report period as per GST Returns
Customer Wise Bifurcation of total Revenue and its Ranking MoM basis across the report period as per GST Returns
Supplier Wise Bifurcation of total Purchases & Expenses MoM basis across the report period as per GST Returns
Product Wise HSN wise data for each month across the report period and also detailed HSN wise data
Difference between Revenue as per GSTR 1 vs GSTR 3B and other data sets as per GSTR 3B Returns

metrics.table_title: Profile and Filing Details of Customers and Suppliers
metrics.description: Master Profile Details and the GSTR 3B Filling Compliance for the Top 20 Customers and Suppliers of the TTM

metrics.table_title: Tax Payment trend and ITC details
metrics.description: Detailed Tax Payment Trend and Input tax Details MoM basis across the report period as per GST Returns
Detailed Breakup of Revenue for all the years across the report period as per Annual GST Returns and the differences between Annual Return vs GSTR 1 Return data sets
Detailed Tax Payment Trend and Input tax Details for all the Years across the report period as per Annual GST Returns
